<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Natural Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=815) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You can apply natural cures to heal your allies. You can use Nature instead of Medicine to Treat Wounds. If you’re in the wilderness, you might have easier access to fresh ingredients, allowing you to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check to Treat Wounds using Nature, subject to the GM’s determination.

<title level="2">Natural Medicine leads to...</title>
[Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1982)
name: Natural Medicine
